Sierra Leone

div.head: Legislation
div.p: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of Sierra Leone does not currently have a system for the declassification of its records. Many of the ministryâ€™s records were destroyed during the recent civil war.

div.head: Location
div.p: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs is located on Gloucester Street in Freetown.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should apply to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Freetown with a letter of sponsorship and proof of credentials for access to documents. The Ministry will approve access on an ad hoc basis.
